# https://kitticker.com

User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap location (auto-generated by Astro)
Sitemap: https://kitticker.com/sitemap-index.xml

# Disallow crawling of duplicate/redirect paths
Disallow: /api/

# Host directive for search engines
Host: https://kitticker.com
